thread.title: Sony Six to broadcast Vijender's debut pro bout
thread.title_full: Sony Six to broadcast Vijender's debut pro bout - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Sony Six to broadcast Vijender's debut pro bout
text:
MUMBAI: Sony Six will telecast the debut professional bout of star Indian boxer Vijender Singh, scheduled on October 10 in Manchester. 

Vijender will take on British boxer Sonny Whiting and the fight headlined as 'World War III will be telecast at 10:20pm (IST). 

Whiting is three-bouts old and has a 2-1 overall record so far in the middleweight division. The fight will feature four rounds of three minutes each. 

Vijender is being trained by renowned coach Lee Beard and has been sparring alongside stable mates Jack Catterall, Adrian Gonzalez and Jimmy Kelly.
